mapper.select: select tbr.*,ts.student_name,ts.student_num,tbed.bed_num,td.dormitory_num,ta.apartment_name,tu.username as record_user_name,tu2.username as handle_user_name from tb_bad_record tbr left join tb_student ts on tbr.student_id = ts.id left join tb_dormitory td on tbr.dormitory_id = td.id left join tb_user tu on tbr.record_user_id = tu.id left join tb_user tu2 on tbr.handle_user_id = tu2.id left join tb_apartment ta on td.apartment_id = ta.id left join tb_bed tbed on ts.bed_id = tbed.bed_num where tbr.id = #{id}
